message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I believe a starting price of $1,400,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. This is my maximum budget for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but $1,200,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet halfway at $1,300,000?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,300,000. How about we meet at $1,250,000?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  $1,250,000 is close, but to make this work on my end, I need to be at $1,275,000. This is my final offer.
I understand you're close to your limit, but I'm still not comfortable with $1,275,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer, so how about $1,225,000?
